file_content.text: Could have trained anywhere. I chose Ziost because it's historic. Old-world Empire. Knew it would be rough going, but....
You're saying they killed your entire class? Our own people?
Thought it was an initiation thing. You know, to scare us. But then they raised their rifles all at once, and then....
We were meant to graduate tomorrow.
Done that a day early, I suppose.
